function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i<4' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i<4' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'j<3' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'j<3' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<4' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j<3' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'a (line 4)' used after its definition?
Does the value assigned to 'b (line 5)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Is variable 'i' live at the end of function 'main'?
Does variable 'b' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
